import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Layout, Row, Col, Table } from 'antd'; import '../assets/css/portofolio.css' import Navbar from '../common/layout/navbar-landing' import ButtonHome from '../common/component/button/button-home'; const { Content } = Layout; // membuat konstanta content const whyData = [ { title: 'No', dataIndex: 'no', key: 'no', fixed: 'left', width: 100, render: text => {text}, sorter: (a, b) => a.no - b.no, sortDirections: ['ascend','descend'], }, { title: 'Nama Anak', dataIndex: 'nama_event', key: 'nama_event', width: 100, fixed: 'left', ...this.getColumnSearchProps('nama_event'), }, { title: 'Berat Badan', dataIndex: 'nama_panitia', key: 'nama_panitia', ...this.getColumnSearchProps('nama_panitia'), }, { title: 'Tinggi Badan', dataIndex: 'nama_panitia', key: 'nama_panitia', ...this.getColumnSearchProps('nama_panitia'), }, { title: 'Instansi', dataIndex: 'instansi', key: 'instansi', ...this.getColumnSearchProps('instansi'), }, { title: 'Lokasi', dataIndex: 'jabatan', key: 'jabatan', ...this.getColumnSearchProps('jabatan'), } ] class KmsComponent extends Component{ render(){ const { initialData, data, columns } = this.props; return(
Data KMS Anak
Platform pengisian data KMS oleh Admin Posyandu.
{ whyData.map( data =>
{data.title}
{data.description}

) }
Waiting List
columns={columns} dataSource={data} className="table-active-event"
); } } export default KmsComponent;
